      • getRolesAllowedAccess

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRolesAllowedAccess(Request<T> request)
                                                       throws ServiceException
        If the request user belongs to any of these roles, access is granted.
        Returns:
        set of roles, or null if anyone's allowed NOTE: isAuthenticationRequired(Request) must return true for this to work with Java container authentication.

        ServiceException
